data.text: Tell Yahweh that you thank him very much for the good things that he has done for you
You Israeli people should repeatedly shout,
You priests who are descendants of Aaron should repeatedly shout,
All you who revere him should repeatedly shout,
When I was distressed, I called out to Yahweh,
Yahweh is ◄on my side/helping me►,
Yes, Yahweh is ◄on my side/helping me►,
It is better to trust in Yahweh
It is better to trust Yahweh to protect us
Armies of [MTY] many nations surrounded me,
They completely surrounded me,
They swarmed around me like angry bees;
My enemies attacked me fiercely and almost defeated me,
Yahweh is the one who makes me strong,
Listen to the joyful songs of victory being sung in the tents of godly/righteous people!
he has raised his strong right arm to show he has defeated his enemies.
I will not be killed in battle;
Yahweh has punished me severely,
You gatekeepers, open for me the gates of the temple
Those are the gates through which we enter the temple to worship Yahweh;
Yahweh, I thank you that you answered my prayer,
Yahweh’s promised/chosen king is like [MET] the stone which the builders rejected
◄This was done by Yahweh/Yahweh has done this►,
This is the day in which we remember that Yahweh acted powerfully to defeat our enemies;
Yahweh, we plead with you to keep rescuing us from our enemies.
Yahweh, bless the one who will come with your authority [MTY].
Yahweh is God,
Yahweh, you are the God whom I worship, and I will praise you!
Thank Yahweh, because he does good things for us
